statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory;
SELECT customer_id, item_id FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT item_id, purchase_date FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, customer_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY purchase_count DESC
SELECT customer_id, item_id, purchase_date FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 100 AND purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT item_id, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory GROUP BY item_id HAVING purchase_count > 2 ORDER BY purchase_count DESC
SELECT * FROM customer LIMIT 10
SELECT name, email FROM customer WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT customer.name, purchase_history.product_name FROM customer INNER JOIN purchase_history ON customer.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price FROM purchase_history
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT customer.name, purchase_history.product_name, purchase_history.price FROM customer JOIN purchase_history ON customer.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_history.price DESC;

SELECT customer.name, customer.email, purchase_history.product_name, purchase_history.purchase_date FROM customer LEFT JOIN purchase_history ON customer.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE membership_status = TRUE;
SELECT AVG(age) as avg_age, gender, COUNT(*) as num_customers FROM customer GROUP BY gender ORDER BY avg_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 'f0123456-789a-bcde-f012-3456789abcde';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%a%';
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT recommended_product, recommendation_date FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;

SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, pu.purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases pu ON c.customer_id = pu.customer_id JOIN products p ON pu.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY pu.purchase_date DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, r.recommendation_id FROM customers c LEFT JOIN recommendations r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE r.recommendation_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY c.customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT name, price FROM product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customer WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM purchase WHERE total_amount > 1000;

SELECT customer.name, product.name, recommendation_date FROM customer JOIN recommendation ON customer.customer_id = recommendation.customer_id JOIN product ON recommendation.product_id = product.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM customer WHERE name LIKE 'A%' OR name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT p.name, pp.quantity, pr.price FROM product p INNER JOIN product_purchase pp ON p.product_id = pp.product_id INNER JOIN purchase pur ON pp.purchase_id = pur.purchase_id WHERE pur.purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, r.recommendation_date AS recommendation_date FROM recommendation r LEFT JOIN customer c ON r.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE r.recommendation_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, SUM(pp.quantity) AS total_quantity, SUM(p.price * pp.quantity) AS total_amount FROM customer c INNER JOIN purchase pur ON c.customer_id = pur.customer_id INNER JOIN product_purchase pp ON pur.purchase_id = pp.purchase_id INNER JOIN product p ON pp.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY c.customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
